data.script:
<script>
    import {
        Button,
        TextInput,
        lost_focus,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";

    let has_focus = false;
</script>

<TextInput
    palette={has_focus ? "affirmative" : "negative"}
    actions={[
        [
            lost_focus,
            {
                enabled: has_focus,
                on_lost_focus: () =>
                    (has_focus = false),
            },
        ],
    ]}
    on:focusin={() => (has_focus = true)}
/>

<Button>Focus me!</Button>
data.title: lost_focus Preview
